name: Murder Strip
description:
A horror game about American urban planning.

As someone who doesn't own a car, you depend on the highway bike lane—one that's highly maintained and keeps all bicycle users safe from any harm that may come their way!

Controls:

  • Pedaling: alternate left and right arrow keys
  • Turning: A and D keys
  • Braking: down arrow key
  • Moving backwards: S key
  • Ringing the bell: Q key

Made in a week for the 32bit Spring Cleaning 2022 Game Jam.
